# validateUserInterfaceItem(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether to enable the specified item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func validateUserInterfaceItem(_ item: any NSValidatedUserInterfaceItem) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **item**: The user interface item to validate.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the specified item responds to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController/toggleSidebar(_:)], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it doesn’t.
title: validateUserInterfaceItem(_:)
